text: Just saying goodbyeI m sorry but this is the place that I am afraid I have to say goodbye    It s been a heck of a two years   I had a very stressful job and fell into depression   I struggled with it all my life  but this time was different   It got so bad that I had to go on disability   I did that for a little under   months   I went to doctors  was in the hospital  tried numerous medicines  even did electro shock therapy   I went back to work and was let go   weeks later Lost my job Lost my car Lost my   Labrador s when I lost my house My wife filed for legal separation to protect herself She moved out with our   kids She won t let me see them because I am too depressed Have about  k in credit card debt My wife claimed all the cash and house equity in separation and I will have about  k in tax liability Had to move out of the studio apartment and into my parents home  I m    I didn t read and just signed the separation papers as I felt so bad about what I put them through I ve become a burden to my friends I have been sleeping   hours a day I bought a gun   I picked it up   days ago after the waiting period My notes are written  I picked out a place in the woods   I feel so bad for the person that finds me   I have made a sign that I will tack on a tree about   yards away so hopefully they won t see me and can call police Anyway  I just wanted to say goodbye   I can t say goodbye to my friends and family as I don t want to traumatize them more than I will Thanks for listening
summary: After a stressful two years, he lost his job, his house, his car and his Labrador. His wife filed for legal separation. She moved out with their kids. He didn't read the separation papers. He bought a gun. He picked out a place in the woods. He doesn't want to say goodbye to his friends.

text: My mom attempted suicide yesterday I don t know if this is the best place to write this  There is no  r suicideattempticuvisitors or anything line that as far as I can tell I m sitting here next to my mom in the ICU  she s hooked up to a ventilator and a stomach pump and a dozen other machines  It will be like this for the next several days  She took a bottle of amitriptyline  I m hurt and angry yet I understand   My parents are both   and they re going through a divorce  They moved from Georgia to Minnesota four years ago  mostly to run from my brother s death  He died about six years ago at the age of   They never really dealt with it  My mom has been crippled with grief  My dad has this messed up psychological need to befriend single mothers and their sons so he can replace the son he lost  Nothing creepy or anything toward the kids  but it s led to affairs and has messed my mother up even more   Last week she moved back here to Georgia to be closer to friends and to me  I couldn t visit her over the weekend which I m kicking myself over   I can t look at her  My wife is talking to her and holding her hand  telling me she s squeezing her hand back and making facial expressions  I just want to go home and crawl into bed   My emotional brain is pissed  My logical brain understands  She s has a horrible time of the last six years  I kinda want to respect her decision  you know  She s old enough and has experienced enough to know that she wants to be done  I can see suicide as a logical decision  I don t like it at all  but I understand  If this is the best she s going to get  I m not going to let them keep her on the breathing machine   I just needed to get this out
summary: My mom tried to commit suicide yesterday. She took a bottle of amitriptyline. My parents are going through a divorce. They moved from Georgia to Minnesota four years ago to escape the grief of their brother, who died six years ago. My mom moved back to Georgia to be closer to friends.

text: My genetics are shitDon t wanna get too much into detail  but I m basically a   y o   or   male with acne and a balding head  I look and feel like a disaster and I seriously consider jumping infront of the subway train whenever I m there  My only hope might be to get a decent paying job if I don t kill myself before my graduation in   years so I can afford to get rid of my acne  but then I ll still be a   balding male I m awkward  slow and boring so my looks aren t my only problem  but I ll certainly die alone because of my standards Nothing special about me  I don t get pitty because I m not crippled  haven t lost a close one and I don t have ridiculous financial problems  I m just the kid who never grew up and therefore flew under the radar  I m very close to being hopeless
